instruction: Create a story about a person who is looking for a job and struggling with their decision.
output: John was in a dilemma. After four months of searching, he had finally gotten an offer from a prestigious company, but he wasn't sure if he wanted to take the job. On the one hand, the job offered a great salary, and it would look great on his resume. On the other, the company was known to have a difficult and demanding work environment, and he was afraid that he wouldn't be able to keep up with the expectations. He had already gone through so many interviews, and this job offer was like a dream come true. But, could he handle the pressure? He was terrified that he would make a wrong decision and regret it for the rest of his life. All he wanted was to find the right job and he was struggling to make the best decision for his future.
